Body:
async with ClientSession(base_url=b'http://localhost:8080', pools=
    pools_factory(responses), follow_redirects=False) as client:
    response = await client.get(b'/')
    assert response.status == 302
    location = response.headers[b'location']
    assert location
    assert location[0] == expected_location
pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('responses,expected_location', [[[Response(302, [(
    b'Location', b'/a')]), Response(302, [(b'Location', b'/b')]), Response(
    200, None, TextContent('Hello, World!'))], b'/a']])
